Is this article primarily about a new action or announcement by the Trump administration/White House/Executive? Respond simply with "yes" or "no" .
Rep. Morgan Griffith (R-Virginia) said the federal grant freeze did not come up during a meeting...
Rep. Morgan Griffith (R-Virginia) said the federal grant freeze did not come up during a meeting Tuesday between House Republicans and Vice President JD Vance in Miami.
“Obviously all of our constituents are concerned,” Griffith told The Post. “But the Biden administration was shoveling money out the door so fast that there’s real questions as to whether they went through the proper protocols on it.”
